content.text:
# Indian Telly Award for Fan Favorite Show

| year           = 2002
| holder         = Anupamaa
| website        = [http://www.indiantellyawards.com Indian Telly Awards]
}}
Indian Telly Award for Fan Favorite Show is an award given as a part of the annual Indian Telly Awards. The award is voted for by the fans.
